name: AR10 - Bảng kê đơn hàng bán
query:
WITH Total_Taxes AS (
SELECT 
        tstac.parent AS sales_order_id, 
        SUM(tstac.tax_amount) AS total_tax_amount
FROM
    `tabSales Taxes and Charges` tstac
GROUP BY
    tstac.parent
),
Item_Totals AS (
SELECT 
        tsoi.parent AS sales_order_id,
        tsoi.item_code,
        tsoi.qty,
        tsoi.base_net_amount AS item_net_amount,
        (tsoi.base_net_amount / (
    SELECT
        SUM(tsoi2.base_net_amount)
    FROM
        `tabSales Order Item` tsoi2
    WHERE
        tsoi2.parent = tsoi.parent)) AS allocation_percentage
FROM
    `tabSales Order Item` tsoi
LEFT JOIN `tabSales Order` tso ON
    tso.name = tsoi.parent
WHERE
    tso.company = 'SSG'
    AND tsoi.transaction_date BETWEEN DATE('2024-11-01') AND DATE('2024-11-20')
GROUP BY
    tsoi.item_code
),
TAX_ALLOCATION AS (
SELECT 
        it.sales_order_id,
        it.item_code,
        it.qty,
        it.item_net_amount,
        it.allocation_percentage,
        tt.total_tax_amount,
        (it.allocation_percentage * tt.total_tax_amount) AS allocated_tax_to_item
FROM
    Item_Totals it
LEFT JOIN Total_Taxes tt ON
    it.sales_order_id = tt.sales_order_id
)
SELECT 
    tsoi.transaction_date AS transaction_date,
    NULL AS ca_ban_hang,
    NULL AS pos,
    tso.order_type AS order_type,
    tso.name AS so_ct,
    NULL AS note,
    tsoi.description AS description,
    ti.item_code AS item_code,
    tsoi.qty AS quantity,
    tsoi.rate AS price,
    tsoi.amount AS net_amount,
    (CASE 
        WHEN ISNULL(TA.allocated_tax_to_item) THEN 0
        ELSE TA.allocated_tax_to_item
    END) AS tax_amount,
    NULL AS gia_von,
    NULL AS tien_von,
    tc.name AS customer_code,
    tc.customer_name AS customer_name
FROM
    `tabSales Order Item` tsoi
LEFT JOIN `tabSales Order` tso ON
    tso.name = tsoi.parent
LEFT JOIN `tabItem` ti ON
    ti.item_code = tsoi.item_code
LEFT JOIN TAX_ALLOCATION TA ON
    TA.sales_order_id = tsoi.parent
    AND TA.item_code = tsoi.item_code
LEFT JOIN `tabCustomer` tc ON
    tc.name = tso.customer
WHERE
    tso.company = %(company)s
    AND tsoi.transaction_date BETWEEN DATE(%(start_date)s) AND DATE(%(end_date)s)
ORDER BY
    tso.name ASC
report_name: AR10 - Bảng kê đơn hàng bán
